content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 362.2 - Table to determine the maximum amount of employee contributions

State Regulations
(a) The maximum contribution for an employee (per pay period) shall not exceed: Per pay period

For employees paid daily....... $.14

For employees paid weekly........60

For employees paid every two weeks....... 1.20

For employees paid twice a month....... 1.30

For employees paid monthly....... 2.60

If an employee is paid, in whole or in part, at other
intervals, his or her contribution shall be determined at the rate of one half
of one percent of wages paid, but shall not be more than the equivalent of 60
cents per week. (b) If an
employee who is paid daily performs services for the same employer on three or
more days in the same calendar week, his or her contribution for such week
shall be computed on the same basis as for employees paid weekly. Notes
